motd:
This build introduces deeper support for notifications/webhooks (alpha) by supporting deep linking to content and displaying images within the system notifications!

This build also adds a new button the AppBar when you are within a series/movie/artist page. The pencil/edit icon now takes you directly to the edit page, and the three vertical dots will open the menu to refresh, delete, etc.
